evs.data
Class ConditionArray

java.lang.Object
  evs.data.ConditionArray

public class ConditionArray
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience class for collating an array of Condition objects and allowing them to be applied sequentially to the input data.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com
